txt.en: This glass-shard is dirty and dulled, but through the dust and grime you can see its bright purple colour. You know from the tales of Moria, the dwarves had several different coloured lamps they used to find hidden doors. With a couple more purple fragments, you may have enough shards to construct a purple lamp.
'You seem to have found enough purple lamp-fragments to make a working purple dwarf-lamp. With such a lamp, you will be able to find the doors my people hid in these deeps.'
'A purple lamp-fragment. Most intriguing. With a few more, we may be able to fashion a working lamp.'
Coloured lamps were used to reveal hidden dwarf-doors during the height of Moria.
Purple glass-shards may be found on Ghâsh-hai Orcs in the Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou will need to find a few more purple glass-shards to craft a purple lamp.
Bring the purple lamp-fragments to the dwarves in Anazârmekhem

Dwarves are in Anazârmekhem, in the northern Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou have gathered enough purple glass-shards to reconstruct a purple lamp. Perhaps one of the dwarves can help you fashion them into a functioning lamp.
